doc:
Rick Aviles https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rick_Aviles 0 Rick Aviles (October 14, 1952 – March 17, 1995) was an American stand-up comedian and actor of Puerto Rican descent, best remembered for portraying the villainous Willie Lopez in the film Ghost. Rick_Aviles ( October_14_,_1952 – March_17_,_1995 ) was an_American_stand-up_comedian_and_actor of Puerto_Rican_descent , best remembered for portraying the_villainous_Willie_Lopez in the_film_Ghost .
